程序包 P2V

类 P2DViewer

java.lang.Object
P2V.P2DViewer
public class P2DViewer extends Object
P2DViewer is the very main class of P2DViewer library. This class is in charge of rendering any visual objects.
作者:
Telsa

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    static int
    defaultAnimationMode
    The default animation mode for the P2DViewer.
    protected static Variable
    fillB
    The blue component of the fill color in the P2DViewer.
    protected static Variable
    fillG
    The green component of the fill color in the P2DViewer.

    fillR
    The red component of the fill color in the P2DViewer.
    static int
    frameCountOfOneMove
    The frame count for one move in the P2DViewer.

    noFill
    A flag indicating whether to fill shapes in the P2DViewer.

    The list of VObjs in the P2DViewer.

    The PApplet instance associated with the P2DViewer.

    The position of the P2DViewer.

    scale
    The scale of the P2DViewer.
    static int
    sendAnimationOrderForEditing
    If this value is set non-0, all the toMove animation will not be triggered until sendAnimationOrderForPlaying equals to this value.
    static int
    sendAnimationOrderForPlaying
    If sendAnimationOrderForEditing is set non-0, all the toMove animation will not be triggered until this value equals to sendAnimationOrderForEditing.
    static boolean
    sharedVariableMode
    If sharedVariableMode is set false, a Variable could be actualMove() multiple times during a drawObj().
    protected static Variable
    spin
    The rotation angle of the P2DViewer.

  • 字段详细资料

    • sendAnimationOrderForEditing

      public static int sendAnimationOrderForEditing
      If this value is set non-0, all the toMove animation will not be triggered until sendAnimationOrderForPlaying equals to this value.

    • sendAnimationOrderForPlaying

      public static int sendAnimationOrderForPlaying
      If sendAnimationOrderForEditing is set non-0, all the toMove animation will not be triggered until this value equals to sendAnimationOrderForEditing.

    • sharedVariableMode

      public static boolean sharedVariableMode
      If sharedVariableMode is set false, a Variable could be actualMove() multiple times during a drawObj().

  • 方法详细资料

    • init

      public static void init(processing.core.PApplet p)
      Use P2DViewer.init(this); to make P2DViewer able to control Processing PApplet.
      参数:
      p - the PApplet you want to control.

    • toMovePosi

      public static void toMovePosi(float x, float y) throws Exception
      Moves the viewer to the specified position using animation.
      参数:
      x - the x-coordinate of the position
      y - the y-coordinate of the position
      抛出:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the move

    • toMovePosi

      public static void toMovePosi(VXy xy) throws Exception
      Moves the viewer to the specified position using animation.
      参数:
      xy - the position as a VXy object
      抛出:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the move

    • toMovePosiRelatively

      public static void toMovePosiRelatively(float x, float y) throws Exception
      Moves the viewer to the specified position relative to its current position using animation.
      参数:
      x - the amount to move along the x-axis
      y - the amount to move along the y-axis
      抛出:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the move

    • removeVObjById

      public static int removeVObjById(int id)
      Removes the VObj object with the specified ID from the viewer's list of objects.
      参数:
      id - the ID of the VObj object to remove
      返回:
      the index of the removed VObj object, or -1 if the object was not found

      返回:
      the number of VObj objects

    • putVObjToTopByIndex

      public static void putVObjToTopByIndex(int index)
      Moves the VObj object at the specified index to the top of the viewer's list of objects.
      参数:
      index - the index of the VObj object

    • putVObjToTopById

      public static int putVObjToTopById(int id)
      Move the VObj with the specified ID to the end of the objs list. Attention, P2DViewer renders graphics in the order specified by the objs list, so the graphics that are placed towards the end of the list will be less likely to be obscured. This is also why the function "putVObjToTopByIndex()" actually puts the VObj object at the end of the objs list.
      参数:
      id - The ID of the VObj to remove.
      返回:
      The index of the moved VObj if found, or -1 if the VObj with the specified ID was not found.

    • putVObjToBottomByIndex

      public static void putVObjToBottomByIndex(int index)
      Move the VObj with the specified index to the head of the objs list. Attention, P2DViewer renders graphics in the order specified by the objs list, so the graphics that are placed towards the end of the list will be less likely to be obscured. This is also why the function "putVObjToBottomByIndex()" actually puts the VObj object at the head of the objs list.
      参数:
      index - The ID of the VObj to remove.

    • putVObjToSomewhereByIndex

      public static void putVObjToSomewhereByIndex(int index, int pos)
      Moves the VObj at the specified index to a new position in the P2DViewer's list of VObjs. The order of rendering in P2DViewer is based on the order of VObjs in the list. VObjs placed towards the end of the list will be less likely to be obscured.
      参数:
      index - The index of the VObj to move.
      pos - The new position in the P2DViewer's list where the VObj will be placed.

    • putVObjToBottomById

      public static int putVObjToBottomById(int id)
      Moves the VObj at the specified index to the beginning of the P2DViewer's list of VObjs. The order of rendering in P2DViewer is based on the order of VObjs in the list. VObjs placed towards the beginning of the list will be less likely to be obscured.
      参数:
      id - The id of the VObj to move.

    • putVObjToSomewhereById

      public static int putVObjToSomewhereById(int id, int pos)
      Moves the VObj at the specified index to a new position in the P2DViewer's list of VObjs. The order of rendering in P2DViewer is based on the order of VObjs in the list. VObjs placed towards the end of the list will be less likely to be obscured.
      参数:
      id - The id of the VObj to move.
      pos - The new position in the P2DViewer's list where the VObj will be placed.

    • actualMove

      public static void actualMove() throws Exception
      Makes all the properties of P2DViewer change to the status of next frame.
      抛出:
      Exception - If moving the visual object fails for some reason.

    • setFillRGB

      public static void setFillRGB(float r, float g, float b)
      Sets the fill color of the viewer using RGB values.
      参数:
      r - the red component of the fill color
      g - the green component of the fill color
      b - the blue component of the fill color

    • setFill

      public static void setFill(float brightness)
      Sets the fill color of the viewer using a brightness value.
      参数:
      brightness - the brightness of the fill color (0-255)

    • drawObj

      public static void drawObj() throws Exception
      Draws the objects contained in the P2DViewer. This method is responsible for rendering the objects within the P2DViewer onto the associated PGraphics instance. This method calls the actualMove() method of each object to update its movement. This method is recommended to be put in draw() of Processing.
      抛出:
      Exception - if an exception occurs during the rendering process.
